snippet: Dr. Han, who was believed to have been 96, was a medical doctor and proponent of Mao who also wrote novels and memoirs, including one that became the Hollywood film “Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing.”
abstract: Han Suyin, physician and author, dies; precise year of her birth is uncertain, but she is believed to have been 96.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Han, who was believed to have been 96, was a medical doctor and proponent of Mao who also wrote novels and memoirs, including one that became the Hollywood film “Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing.”

headline.seo: Han Suyin Dies; Wrote Sweeping Fiction
headline.main: Han Suyin Dies; Wrote Sweeping Fiction
headline.print_headline: Han Suyin Dies; Wrote Sweeping Fiction
